channel.title: Please help me! :(
channel.description: I typed in ::cart and now i have no idea how to get rid of it. I have tryed everything can you please tell me the command on how to get rid of it? :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2007, 01:04:02 AM[/size][hr]This is only with 1 server but

item.title: Please help me! :(
item.dc:creator: @jurm jurm
item.description:
@jurm wrote:

Well, I have a quick fix (might not work)
Find:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cart")){

And replace the whole thing with:

if(pHead = 1){	
  sendMessage("You are a cart thing. Wheee?"); 
  pHead=82;	
  pTorso=82;
  pArms=82;
  pHands=82;
  pLegs=82;
  pFeet=82;
  updateRequired = true; 
  appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if (pHead = 82){
  sendmessage("You are a human again");
  pHead=1;
  pBeard=10; 
  pTorso=18;
  pArms=26;
  pHands=33;
  pLegs=36;
  pFeet=42;    
  updateRequired = true; 
  appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}

or just type ::male or ::female

Read full topic
